forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...scattered thunderstorms this morning, then cloudy skies with rain likely during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...scattered thunderstorms during the morning. A steady rain will arrive this afternoon. High 57F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers early...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers early, then mainly cloudy after midnight with light rain possible. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain early. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the morning. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 54F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
